examples: A mixture of skill and good luck decided the outcome of the game.
The courts decided in favor of the New York claimants.
The Appeal Court decided in their favour.
The case will be decided by a jury.
The government decided to abandon the proposed legislation due to public opposition.
words.defineEn: to think carefully about different things and choose one of them
words.defineVi: suy nghĩ cẩn thận về những điều khác nhau và chọn một trong số họ

words.defineEn: food that is bought from a restaurant, etc. to be eaten elsewhere
words.defineVi: thực phẩm được mua từ một nhà hàng, vv để ăn ở nơi khác

examples: We can't forget the limburger cheese!
My son never forgets to pack a few cherry tomatoes in his lunchbox.
I forgot my umbrella, and now I'm getting wet in the rain.
Don't forget to bring your books with you.
Don't forget to sprinkle some shredded cheese on the pizza as a tasty topping.
words.defineEn: to not be able to remember something or someone from the past
words.defineVi: để không thể nhớ một cái gì đó hoặc ai đó từ quá khứ

examples: He reached over and turned off his bedside light.
Jill must have been in another world when I asked her to turn off the oven because the bread is burned now.
"Turn off?"
Once inside, he turned off the security alarm.
Don't turn off the captions.
words.defineEn: to cause a machine, device, or equipment to stop operating, typically by pushing a button or turning a key
words.defineVi: làm cho máy móc, thiết bị hoặc thiết bị ngừng hoạt động, thường bằng cách nhấn nút hoặc vặn chìa khóa

examples: He's hoping for an offer of compensation.
I hope this guilty verdict puts that rat of a CEO in his place.
I hope you have it on your conscience for the rest of your days!
I hope this letter reaches you.
I hope you've learned a lesson from this, Eddie.
words.defineEn: to want something to happen or be true
words.defineVi: để muốn một cái gì đó xảy ra hoặc là sự thật

examples: See full dictionary entry for heart.
See my car?
This stadium has seen many thrilling football games.
The twentieth century saw dramatic changes in most areas of life.
Our car has seen better days!
words.defineEn: to notice a thing or person with our eyes
words.defineVi: để ý một điều hoặc người với đôi mắt của chúng tôi

examples: To learn a language/skill/trade.
High time you learned a thing or two.
He learned about the different departments within the police organization.
She learns about the laws of physics and the properties of matter in her science lessons.
I learned about different breeds of cows and their characteristics.
words.defineEn: to gain knowledge of or skill in something by experience, by study, or by being taught
words.defineVi: để đạt được kiến thức hoặc kỹ năng trong một cái gì đó bằng kinh nghiệm, nghiên cứu, hoặc bằng cách được dạy

examples: Troops drove out the demonstrators.
Hunger drives the wolf out of the wood.
A stream of black cars drove by.
A stream of black cars drove by.
The waves drove against the shore.
words.defineEn: to control the movement and the speed of a car, bus, truck, etc. when it is moving
words.defineVi: để kiểm soát chuyển động và tốc độ của ô tô, xe buýt, xe tải, v.v. khi nó đang di chuyển

examples: The soup needs a little more seasoning.
This shirt needs washing.
My father's car needs an oil change.
I need a lightweight sweater for the spring season.
We need a new brush for our pet's fur.
words.defineEn: to want something or someone that we must have if we want to do or be something
words.defineVi: muốn một cái gì đó hoặc một ai đó mà chúng ta phải có nếu chúng ta muốn làm hoặc trở thành một cái gì đó

examples: On the credit side, the restaurant offers a wide range of choices.
Italy's Mediterranean climate and diverse geography offer a wide range of outdoor activities
The store sometimes offers discounts on certain items.
The vegetarian menu offers a delicious black bean burrito as a protein-packed option.
The textile store offers bolts of various fabrics, from cotton to linen.
words.defineEn: to present or propose something to someone
words.defineVi: để trình bày hoặc đề xuất một cái gì đó cho một ai đó

examples: The support of our families has helped enormously.
Helping you?
Such helps were like drop in the ocean.
The taxi driver helped me with my luggage.
His help is useful as a chocolate teapot.
words.defineEn: to give someone what they need or to make doing something easier or possible for them
words.defineVi: để cung cấp cho ai đó những gì họ cần hoặc để làm điều gì đó dễ dàng hơn hoặc có thể cho họ

examples: I planned a surprise party for my little sister's birthday.
She planned a romantic candlelit meal for their anniversary.
They are planning a movie night at the movie theater with their family.
The plan ran into a brick wall.
The closing of the airport knocked our holiday plans on the head.
words.defineEn: to decide on the details of a future activity or event
words.defineVi: để quyết định về các chi tiết của một hoạt động hoặc sự kiện trong tương lai

words.defineEn: to legally become someone's wife or husband
words.defineVi: để hợp pháp trở thành vợ hoặc chồng của một ai đó

examples: He pretended the carrot was a microphone and sang a silly song in front of the mirror.
Just do your thing and pretend I'm not here.
She played a trick on her friend by pretending to forget her birthday.
He had a collection of toys and loved pretending they were alive.
He pretended the galangal root was a secret ingredient and challenged his friends to create unique dishes.
words.defineEn: to act in a specific way in order to make others believe that something is the case when actually it is not so
words.defineVi: hành động theo một cách cụ thể để khiến người khác tin rằng điều gì đó đúng như vậy trong khi thực tế không phải như vậy

examples: The town is three miles away.
The kangaroo was making mincemeat of him.
Many more businesses are feeling the chill wind of the recession.
The universal language of art is bridging a divide.
Then again, some major thinkers are way ahead of the curve.
words.defineEn: used when naming, or giving description or information about people, things, or situations
words.defineVi: được sử dụng khi đặt tên hoặc đưa ra mô tả hoặc thông tin về người, sự vật hoặc tình huống

examples: This broken promise is a real kick in the teeth for our fans.
The committee members promised to put the fund behind a development scheme for the impoverished area.
My boss promised the moon, but never gave me a raise.
Promise you won't tell.
I promised my husband that I would grill some zucchini alongside the steaks.
words.defineEn: to tell someone that something will certainly happen or that we will certainly do something
words.defineVi: để nói với ai đó rằng điều gì đó chắc chắn sẽ xảy ra hoặc chúng tôi chắc chắn sẽ làm điều gì đó

examples: My father pays his bills at the beginning of the month.
Our efforts are finally paying dividends.
Not paying attention.
They both pay their employees badly.
No one paid them any attention.
words.defineEn: to give someone money in exchange for goods or services
words.defineVi: để cung cấp cho ai đó tiền để đổi lấy hàng hóa hoặc dịch vụ

examples: Always remember that.
I'll always remember this holiday.
He couldn't remember the name of the movie for the life of him.
Remember Jackson.
I don't remember my first day at school.
words.defineEn: to bring a type of information from the past to our mind again
words.defineVi: để đưa một loại thông tin từ quá khứ vào tâm trí của chúng tôi một lần nữa

examples: Bad weather brought chaos to the utility companies.
The day brings a sense of vitality and liveliness to the world.
The bad weather brought famine.
The revolution brought many changes.
Retirement often brings with it a massive drop in income.
words.defineEn: to take someone or something to a place or to come to a place with someone or something
words.defineVi: đưa ai đó hoặc cái gì đó đến một nơi hoặc đến một nơi với ai đó hoặc cái gì đó

examples: What time does the show start?
Start the engines!
The school semester starts next month.
Who started the fire?
The trail starts just outside the town.
words.defineEn: to begin doing or using something that we were not doing or using before, and continue doing or using it
words.defineVi: để bắt đầu làm hoặc sử dụng một cái gì đó mà chúng tôi đã không làm hoặc sử dụng trước đó và tiếp tục làm hoặc sử dụng nó

examples: Rain is the kiss of death for a barbecue.
Come rain or shine.
The team rained down blows on their opponents, overwhelming them with a flurry of punches.
Could I take a rain check?
This rain looks as if it has set in for the rest of the day.
words.defineEn: (of water) to fall from the sky in the shape of small drops
words.defineVi: (của nước) từ trên trời rơi xuống dưới hình dạng những giọt nước nhỏ

examples: I tried a new coffee blend with hints of chocolate and caramel.
Try some dried apricots as a healthy snack.
Give sweetsop a try!
Have you tried this new coffee?
The case was tried before a jury.
words.defineEn: to make an effort or attempt to do or have something
words.defineVi: để thực hiện một nỗ lực hoặc cố gắng để làm hoặc có một cái gì đó

examples: Find a hobby.
After all, love will find a way.
Water will always find its own level.
She found a dirty stain on her favorite shirt.
The court found in her favor.
words.defineEn: to discover or get back something or someone that we had lost, after searching for it or them
words.defineVi: để khám phá hoặc lấy lại một cái gì đó hoặc ai đó mà chúng tôi đã mất, sau khi tìm kiếm nó hoặc họ

examples: you want a knuckle sandwich?
We want a deal.
I want a new job.
To want children/kids.
I want a dish of creamy mushroom bucatini with Parmesan right now.
words.defineEn: to wish to do or have something
words.defineVi: muốn làm hoặc có một cái gì đó

examples: The film caught a cold over the outstanding debt.
A vase on a side table caught his eye.
The new law caught them unawares.
He caught a glimpse of his reflection in the glass.
As she turned back, a movement across the lawn caught her eye.
words.defineEn: to stop and hold an object that is moving through the air by hands
words.defineVi: để dừng lại và giữ một đối tượng đang di chuyển trong không khí bằng tay

examples: The sauce would kill the taste of the herbs.
This room would make a nice office.
A cure for lung cancer would save thousands of lives each year.
The book dealer would not break up the set.
Would wonders ever cease?
words.defineEn: used to make an offer or request in a polite manner
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để thực hiện một đề nghị hoặc yêu cầu một cách lịch sự

examples: Over seven hundred Facebook users have already liked the company’s website.
He likes the comfortable seats and big screen at the movie theater.
By the next morning, over twenty of my friends had liked my new profile picture.
Like the commandments written in stone.
Such helps were like drop in the ocean.
words.defineEn: to wish for or want something, especially used with would or should as a polite formula
words.defineVi: muốn hoặc muốn một cái gì đó, đặc biệt được sử dụng với sẽ hoặc nên như một công thức lịch sự

examples: My dad bought a stylish suit for his friend's wedding.
The rich man bought a big house and a fancy car.
We bought a bag of coarse sea salt from the specialty store.
She bought an expensive dress for a special occasion.
I bought a pound of fresh meat from the butcher.
words.defineEn: to get something in exchange for paying money
words.defineVi: để có được một cái gì đó để đổi lấy việc trả tiền

words.defineEn: to do something that guarantees the happening of something else or that guarantees something will not happen
words.defineVi: để làm điều gì đó đảm bảo sự xảy ra của điều gì khác hoặc điều đó đảm bảo điều gì đó sẽ không xảy ra

examples: His face wore a puzzled look.
Both men wore confident smiles.
My mom wears facial mask sometmes.
The police officer wears a uniform and a badge.
He wears glasses now.
words.defineEn: to have something such as clothes, shoes, etc. on your body
words.defineVi: để có một cái gì đó như quần áo, giày dép, vv trên cơ thể của bạn

examples: The interviewer asked me a series of questions during the job interview.
Better ask teacher about.
Can I ask a favour of you?
Can I ask a question?
Did you ask the price?
words.defineEn: to use words in a question form or tone to get answers from someone
words.defineVi: để sử dụng các từ trong một hình thức câu hỏi hoặc giai điệu để có được câu trả lời từ một ai đó
